Html:
Hi, nice project you have here :)
I want to ask if its possible to track two identical markers independently? My project got only one week development time so i ask without even looking into the SDK source. Its also quite hard to understand for me.
Was thinking of a parameter like concentration of recognised pixels in a area, to track individual "hotspots" of the same color.

Hi Balex,
Short answer: Touchless isn't currently built to do this. If two markers look the same, both will match pixels of their shared colors.
Adding a notion of numerous "hotspots" for the same set of marker colors is a good idea; although it would be a significant change.
I'm quite backlogged with feature requests, I encourage skilled community members to consider contributing.
- Mike
